section.4: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Rules of Law about the Prayer during Journey

hadiths.text: Narrated Yahya b. Yazid al-Hannani:I asked Anas b. Malik about the shortening of the prayer (while travelling). He said: When the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) went out on a journey of three miles or three farsakh (the narrator Shu'bah doubted), he used to pray two rak'ahs
